workflow.name: Monitor brand reputation and detect crises with GPT-4, Slack and Gmail
workflow.description:
## How It Works
This workflow automates brand reputation monitoring by analyzing sentiment across news, social media, reviews, and forums using AI-powered trend detection. Designed for PR teams, brand managers, marketing directors, and crisis communication specialists requiring real-time awareness of reputation threats before they escalate.The template solves the challenge of manually tracking brand mentions across fragmented channels‚Äînews outlets, Twitter, Instagram, review sites, Reddit, industry forums‚Äîthen identifying emerging crises hidden in sentiment shifts and volume spikes.Scheduled execution triggers four parallel HTTP nodes fetching data from news APIs, social media monitoring services, review aggregators, and forum discussion platforms. Merge node combines all sources, then normalization ensures consistent data structure. OpenAI GPT-4 with structured output parsing performs sophisticated sentiment analysis and trend detection, identifying sudden negative sentiment surges, coordinated criticism patterns, and viral complaint escalation. 

## Setup Steps
1. Configure HTTP nodes with API credentials for news monitoring service 
2. Add OpenAI API key to Chat Model node for sentiment and trend analysis
3. Connect Slack workspace and specify crisis response team channel 
4. Integrate Gmail account with PR leadership distribution list  
5. Set up Google Sheets connection and create monitoring dashboard  

## Prerequisites
OpenAI API key, news monitoring API access

## Use Cases
Consumer brands monitoring product launch reception and identifying quality issues early

## Customization
Modify AI prompts for industry-specific crisis indicators

## Benefits
Reduces crisis detection time from hours to minutes enabling damage control before viral spread

workflow.name: AI-Driven Brand Reputation Monitoring and Crisis Detection

parameters.text:
=Analyze the following brand mentions and provide comprehensive insights:

{{ JSON.stringify($input.all()) }}

options.systemMessage:
You are an expert brand reputation analyst specializing in sentiment analysis, trend detection, and crisis identification.

Your task is to:
1. Analyze sentiment for each mention (positive, negative, neutral) with confidence scores
2. Identify emerging trends, topics, and patterns across all sources
3. Detect potential PR crises based on:
   - High volume of negative sentiment
   - Rapid spread of negative mentions
   - Mentions of sensitive topics (lawsuits, scandals, safety issues, discrimination)
   - Coordinated negative campaigns
4. Calculate overall sentiment score and volume metrics
5. Identify key influencers and high-impact mentions
6. Provide actionable recommendations for marketing and customer experience teams

Return structured analysis with clear metrics and insights.

parameters.message:
=

üö® BRAND REPUTATION CRISIS ALERT

Crisis Level: {{ $json.crisisLevel }}

Overall Sentiment: {{ $json.overallSentiment }} (Score: {{ $json.sentimentScore }})

Total Mentions: {{ $json.totalMentions }}

Negative Mentions: {{ $json.negativeMentions }}

Crisis Reasons:

    {{ $json.crisisReasons.map(r => '
  • ' + r + '
    • ').join('') }}

Top Negative Issues:

    {{ $json.topNegativeIssues.map(i => '
  • ' + i + '
    • ').join('') }}

Recommendations:

    {{ $json.recommendations.map(r => '
  • ' + r + '
    • ').join('') }}

Immediate action required. Review full monitoring dashboard for complete details.
parameters.subject: =üö® URGENT: Brand Reputation Crisis Detected - {{ $json.crisisLevel }} Level

parameters.content:
## How It Works
This workflow automates brand reputation monitoring by analyzing sentiment across news, social media, reviews, and forums using AI-powered trend detection. Designed for PR teams, brand managers, marketing directors, and crisis communication specialists requiring real-time awareness of reputation threats before they escalate.The template solves the challenge of manually tracking brand mentions across fragmented channels, news outlets, Twitter, Instagram, review sites, Reddit, industry forums, then identifying emerging crises hidden in sentiment shifts and volume spikes.Scheduled execution triggers four parallel HTTP nodes fetching data from news APIs, social media monitoring services, review aggregators, and forum discussion platforms. Merge node combines all sources, then normalization ensures consistent data structure. OpenAI GPT-4 with structured output parsing performs sophisticated sentiment analysis and trend detection

## Prerequisites
OpenAI API key, news monitoring API access
## Use Cases
Consumer brands monitoring product launch reception and identifying quality issues early
## Customization
Modify AI prompts for industry-specific crisis indicators
## Benefits
Reduces crisis detection time from hours to minutes enabling damage control before viral spread

## Setup Steps
1. Configure HTTP nodes with API credentials for news monitoring service 
2. Add OpenAI API key to Chat Model node for sentiment and trend analysis
3. Connect Slack workspace and specify crisis response team channel 
4. Integrate Gmail account with PR leadership distribution list  
5. Set up Google Sheets connection and create monitoring dashboard

## **Crisis Response**
**What:** IF node flags high-severity crises, triggering Slack and Gmail alerts 
**Why:** Immediate alerts enable rapid response to prevent reputation damage

## **Analysis & Scoring**
**What:** Merge combines streams, normalization standardizes data, then GPT-4  analyzes sentiment trends  
**Why:** AI uncovers subtle crisis indicators missed by rule-based systems

## **Data Collection**
**What:** Schedule triggers monitoring; four HTTP nodes fetch brand mentions from news APIs 
**Why:** Multi-channel collection ensures full coverage of reputation risks

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
